The packet explodes with a bright flash and a sharp report, filling the area with smoke and defying multiple senses.

Make an attack: Close burst 1; +15 vs. Fortitude; as a free action, you can make a Stealth check against the target with a +4 bonus. If you succeed, you are hidden from that enemy until the end of your turn or until you attack. Creatures that do not rely on sight to detect other creatures are immune to this effect.

Effect: The burst creates a zone, which contains smoke that lasts until the end of your next turn. The smoke lightly obscures the area.
